title: Wrapped Reichstag, Project for Berlin [top panel]
medium: top panel of two parts: collage with printed elevation drawing, photograph by Wolfgang Volz, fabric sample, charcoal, pastel, wax crayon, graphite, and tape on wove paper
dimensions:
Overall: 37.8 x 243.2 cm (14 7/8 x 95 3/4 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 147 x 244 cm (57 7/8 x 96 1/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Christo and Jeanne-Claude in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
